jollyRoger: A frog skull with fangs on crossed bones

keyMoments.title: Crew's Backstory Revealed
keyMoments.description: It is revealed that the Fanged Toad Pirates lost multiple Davy Back Fights against Foxy, resulting in their captain and core members being absorbed into the Foxy Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Explains Kibagaeru's presence with the Foxy Pirates and his motivation for the mutiny.

dissolution.circumstances: Lost five Davy Back Fight matches against the Foxy Pirates, resulting in the crew being absorbed

rivalries.description: Lost multiple Davy Back Fights to the Foxy Pirates

keyMoments.title: Core Members Rescued by Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche are rescued from a storm by the Straw Hats despite their previous antagonistic relationship.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the reduced state of the Foxy Pirates after their defeat.

keyMoments.title: Kibagaeru's Mutiny Revealed
keyMoments.description: The crew discovers that Kibagaeru has taken control of the Foxy Pirates during Foxy's absence, staging a mutiny.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the central conflict of the Foxy's Return Arc.

keyMoments.title: Davy Back Fight for Crew Control
keyMoments.description: Foxy challenges Kibagaeru to a Davy Back Fight to reclaim control of his crew and ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the consequences and stakes of the Davy Back Fight system.

rivalries.description: Previously competed in Davy Back Fight
